Public Methods

List of publicly available endpoints

class dgtx.public.PublicApiClient

Collection of methods that returns public information from the exchange

get_currencies(**kwargs) → Union[List[dgtx.digitex_rest_core.model.currency.Currency], dgtx.digitex_rest_core.exceptions.ApiException]

Returns a list of walletable currencies with some extra params

Each currency instance is a model with the following parameters:

  • id - internal currency id

  • name - currency name

  • code - short currency code

  • currency_scale - amount of digits

  • withdraw_fee - amount in currency you pay if you want to use digitex withdrawal service

Parameters

currency_id – [int] - optional currency id, returns only this currency instance

Returns

List of currencies data models

[
    {'code': 'DGTX',
    'currency_scale': 4,
    'id': 1,
    'name': 'Digitex',
    'withdraw_fee': Decimal('100.000000000000000000')},

    {'code': 'BTC',
    'currency_scale': 8,
    'id': 2,
    'name': 'Bitcoin',
    'withdraw_fee': Decimal('0.000050000000000000')}
 ]
get_exchange_info() → Union[dgtx.digitex_rest_core.model.exchange_info.ExchangeInfo, dgtx.digitex_rest_core.exceptions.ApiException]

Returns list of available currencies, markets and order meta data.

Returns

Exchange Info Meta Data

{
'currencies': # list of currencies, same as get currencies
    [
        {'code': 'DGTX',
        'currency_scale': 4,
        'id': 1,
        'name': 'Digitex',
        'withdraw_fee': Decimal('100.000000000000000000')},
    ...],
'markets': # list of markets, same as get markets
    [
        {'base_currency': {'code': 'BTC',
                        'currency_scale': 8,
                        'id': 2,
                        'name': 'Bitcoin',
                        'withdraw_fee': Decimal('0.000050000000000000')},
        'code': 'S:BTCUSDC',
        'contract_currency': None,
        'description': 'BTC/USDC spot',
        'funding': '0E-18',
        'id': 18,
        'market_type': 2,
        'name': 'BTC/USDC',
        'quote_currency': {'code': 'USDC',
                         'currency_scale': 4,
                         'id': 7,
                         'name': 'USD Coin',
                         'withdraw_fee': Decimal('100.000000000000000000')}},
        {'base_currency': {'code': 'BTC',
                    'currency_scale': 8,
                    'id': 2,
                    'name': 'Bitcoin',
                    'withdraw_fee': Decimal('0.000050000000000000')},
        'code': 'FS:BTCUSD',
         'contract_currency': {'code': 'USDC',
                        'currency_scale': 4,
                        'id': 7,
                        'name': 'USD Coin',
                        'withdraw_fee': Decimal('100.000000000000000000')},
          'description': 'BTC/USD future nominated in USDC',
          'funding': Decimal('0.000300000000000000'),
          'id': 14,
          'market_type': 1,
          'name': 'BTC/USD USDC',
          'quote_currency': {'code': 'USD',
                             'currency_scale': 2,
                             'id': 3,
                             'name': 'USD',
                             'withdraw_fee': Decimal('100.000000000000000000')}},
        ...]

'notifications': [], // list of exchange announcements

'order_meta': # order meta data
    {'duration': {'DURATION_UNDEFINED': 0,
                             'FOK': 5,
                             'GFD': 1,
                             'GTC': 2,
                             'GTF': 3,
                             'IOC': 4},
    'position': {'LONG': 1, 'SHORT': 2, 'UNDEFINED': 0},
    'side': {'BUY': 1, 'SELL': 2},
    'status': {'ACCEPTED': 2,
               'CANCELED': 4,
               'FILLED': 5,
               'PARTIAL': 6,
               'PENDING': 1,
               'REJECTED': 3},
    'type': {'LIMIT': 1, 'MARKET': 2}},
'rate_limits': # not implemented at the moment, but will be soon
                [{'interval': 'SECOND', 'limit': 50},
                 {'interval': 'MINUTE', 'limit': 500}],
 'server_time': 1632607288438219}
get_k_lines(market_id, resolution, **kwargs) → dgtx.digitex_rest_core.model.ohlcv.OHLCV

Get list of ohlcv values for selected market and timeframe/resolutions

Parameters

  • market_id (int, required) – Filtering by number market id. To get market id use “Get list of currently active Markets on exchange” endpoint.

  • resolution (str, required) – Symbol resolution. Possible resolutions are daily (D or 1D, 2D … ), weekly (1W, 2W …), monthly (1M, 2M…) and an intra-day resolution – minutes(1, 2 …)

  • date_from (int, optional, utc, milliseconds) – Unix timestamp (UTC) of the leftmost required bar, including from.

  • date_to (int, optional utc, milliseconds) – Unix timestamp (UTC) of the rightmost required bar, including to. It can be in the future. In this case, the rightmost required bar is the latest available bar.

  • top_n (int, optional) – Number which limits the maximum number of answers. (default = 1000)

Returns

[
    {
        "timestamp": 1617284280000000,
        "open": "59020.000000000000000000",
        "high": "59045.000000000000000000",
        "low": "58980.000000000000000000",
        "close": "58990.000000000000000000",
        "volume": "2129.000000000000000000"
    },
    {
        "timestamp": 1617284340000000,
        "open": "58995.000000000000000000",
        "high": "59030.000000000000000000",
        "low": "58985.000000000000000000",
        "close": "58990.000000000000000000",
        "volume": "315.000000000000000000"
    }
]
get_markets(**kwargs) → List[dgtx.digitex_rest_core.model.market.Market]

Get markets available to trade

Parameters

market_id – [int] - optional market id, returns just this market

Returns

List of markets data class

[
    {
        'base_currency': {'code': 'BTC',
                           'currency_scale': 8,
                           'id': 2,
                           'name': 'Bitcoin',
                           'withdraw_fee': Decimal('0.000050000000000000')},
         'code': 'S:BTCUSDC',
         'contract_currency': None,
         'description': 'BTC/USDC spot',
         'funding': Decimal('0E-18'),
         'id': 18,
         'market_type': 2,
         'name': 'BTC/USDC',
         'quote_currency': {'code': 'USDC',
                            'currency_scale': 4,
                            'id': 7,
                            'name': 'USD Coin',
                            'withdraw_fee': Decimal('100.000000000000000000')}
    }
]
get_order_book(market_id, **kwargs) → dgtx.digitex_rest_core.model.exchange_order_book.ExchangeOrderBook

Get current order book of selected market

Parameters

market_id – id of a market

Returns

class ExchangeOrderBook, asks/bids can be accessed with dot-notation

{'asks': [[Decimal('2913'), Decimal('449')],
          [Decimal('2914'), Decimal('3430')],
          [Decimal('2915'), Decimal('2525')],
          [Decimal('2916'), Decimal('2738')],
          [Decimal('2928'), Decimal('3039')]],
'bids': [[Decimal('2910'), Decimal('4570')],
          [Decimal('2909'), Decimal('2050')],
          [Decimal('2079'), Decimal('8')],
          [Decimal('2076'), Decimal('1000')],
          [Decimal('1070'), Decimal('10')]],
 'market_id': 2,
 'timestamp': 1632571422798363}
get_recent_trades(market_id, **kwargs) → dgtx.digitex_rest_core.model.exchange_recent_trade_list.ExchangeRecentTradeList

Get the list of recent trades at the exhchange for selected markets

Parameters

  • market_id – int - market id

  • max_trades – int - optional parameter to limit output to last max_trades

Returns

class ExchangeRecentTradeList

{'market_id': 23,
 'recent_trades': [{'base_volume': Decimal('9364'),
                    'price': Decimal('4E-8'),
                    'quote_volume': Decimal('0.00037456'),
                    'side': 2,
                    'timestamp': 1632590930368437,
                    'trade_id': 169471322},
                   {'base_volume': Decimal('3518'),
                    'price': Decimal('7E-8'),
                    'quote_volume': Decimal('0.00024626'),
                    'side': 1,
                    'timestamp': 1632590961604440,
                    'trade_id': 169471696}],
 'timestamp': 1632640603867893}
ping() → Union[dgtx.digitex_rest_core.model.ping.Ping, dgtx.digitex_rest_core.exceptions.ApiException]

Check if server is responding, also returns server time in milliseconds

Returns

a data model of ping response. methods can be accessed with dot-notation.

{'message': 'pong',
'timestamp': 1632567734971007}
